sentences.sContent: The big banyan overgrow of my day of day of a block limb, hang below brawny and strong limb full each golden orange.
sentences.sContent_eng: The big banyan overgrow of my day of day of a block limb, hang below brawny and strong limb full each golden orange.
sentences.sCn: 一棵遮天蔽日的大榕树长满了枝干，粗壮有力的枝干下面挂满了一个个金灿灿的橘子。

sentences.sContent: These products have a chance to potentially overgrow their "M" and "P" roots, because they can be used to build a backbone of the enterprise-wide SOA.
sentences.sContent_eng: These products have a chance to potentially overgrow their "M" and "P" roots, because they can be used to build a backbone of the enterprise-wide SOA.
sentences.sCn: 这些产品有机会增长它们的“M”与“P”根，因为它们可以用于构建企业范围 SOA 的框架。

sentences.sContent: Go on the ridge of field of overgrow fireweed , one pace is flabby accurate meeting falls.

sentences.sCn: 走在长满杂草的田埂上，一步不稳准会跌倒。

words.tran: 增生；繁茂；生长过度；过度发育

trans.tranOther: to grow over or across (an area, path, lawn, etc)
